we are looking for a part/perm part/emergent* driver cum delivery. 
You will be involved in chinese funerals which includes setting up of praying altars and 
buffet only(Sometimes both sometimes one item). Those who arent superstitious can apply. 
Suitable for uber/grab or someone whos looking for a side income. The driver may be inform 
days(1or2) in advance or on the day itself(emergence) and the lunch and dinner is provided. 
Salary is paid by hourly with cpf. The delivery is moderately weight , sometimes buffet only or both. 
you can enquire or whasapp at 961***( mr chew) 845***(allan) by the way the company is situated in geylang.

QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
Job Responsibilities: 
 
- Ensure the smooth operation of the store management in the assigned air base 
- Ensure regular stock take on the stores are conducted and account for all Customer supplied products/stores 
- Safe keep and account of all Authority MIS related vouchers and supporting documents. 
- Ensure the services are as per standard specifications. 
- Responsible to conduct the following operation in accordance to the contractual requirements including Receipt management, inventory management, preservation, packaging, spares monitoring 
- Ensure compliance to security policies set forth by the Authority 
- Perform housekeeping within the site 
 
Job Requirements: 
 
- Min. Secondary education or above with at least 3 years of working experience. 
- Experience in warehousing operations or supply chain management would be an added advantage 
- Proficient in MS office 
- Singaporeans only 
- Possess a valid Class 3 Driving License 
- Working Schedule: M-F (8:00 am to 5:30 pm) 
- Working Location: Sembawang/ Yishun/ Choa Chu Kang/ Bukit Gombak/ Paya Lebar 
 
Interested candidates, please send us your detailed resume in MS word format, attached with your recent photograph, stating your current/last drawn & expected salary to cindysee @ acetech.net (Reg No. R1658303, EA Lic. No.: 02C2819)

postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
SPECIAL PROMO !! JOIN US TO GET FREE 5 DAYS RENTAL OFF !! 
 
*Maric Marketing Pte Ltd*  
That's right, the recommended and trusted car rental company your friend is about to tell you!   
 
We are an established company seeking to bring you the best rental car suitable for your driving needs!  
>>>> Most recommended to Uber / Grabcar drivers! <<<   
 
We are best known for our:  
After sales service,  
Fully refundable deposit,  
Friendliness,  
Manager - Driver relation.   
 
We provide the following services : - 
1) Free 24/7 Local Tow Truck services   
2) Free Car Mechanic / Servicing  
3) Low insurance excess of $1,500  
4) Free and easy into Malaysia JB 
5) No minimum trips  
6) Flexible pay rates (with reimbursement for car breakdowns)  
7) No upfront rental payment!  
8) No Acra needed!  
9) Our Company provide Free Orientation for New Sign Up 
 
Terms : - 
1) Must be 22 years and above  
2) Must have a driving license of 2 year and above.  
3) P-plate drivers are NOT allowed  
4) 3 months contract  
5) Deposit of $1000  
 
****DEPOSIT****  
Drivers biggest concern!!!  
YES! Our deposits are fully refundable, and NO we do not charge you for minor scratches or dents.  
(That is a fact, you can ask ANY of our drivers)   
 
Our deposit is $1000, however, the bare minimum payment is $500 with an instalment plan of $100/week to top it up to $1000.   
 
****CONTRACT****  
Minimum 3 months contract, for confident drivers who would like to rent more than 3 months or up to 1 year. Please feel free to contact us to enquire and negotiate car rental as you wish.

ALL other cars are ready at our workshop waiting for you to drive away, all you need to pay is $1000 just to drive away, what are you waiting for?   
 
**** ((((( PROMOTION ))))) ****  
1. 5 DAYS FOC when u sign up NOW.!!

3. Join Our Referral Program Up To $3k / per month !!

5. Uber/Grab drivers under our company may also receive extra incentives (Call Us to find out more!)

postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
A multinational company (MNC) in Supply Chain Industry is looking for Logistics and warehouse assistants: 
 
Job Responsibilities: 
 
- Picking, Packing and issuing 
- Preservation and Packing 
- Stocktaking activities 
- Housekeeping of warehouse 
 
 
Job Requirement: 
 
- Minimum Secondary education with at least 1 year working experience 
- PC literate 
- Working Location: West Area/North Area/Paya Lebar/Changi 
- Working Schedule: M-F 8:00 am to 5:30 pm (5 Days Work Week) 
- Singaporeans only 
 
 
Interested candidates, please send us your detailed resume in MS word format, attached with your recent photograph, stating your current/last drawn & expected salary to 
  show contact info 
 (Reg No. R1658303, EA Lic. No.: 02C2819)
title: Logistics/ Warehouse Assistants - 5 Days Work Week
